channel.title: Georust: Rust the Process
channel.description: A friendly introduction to using the Rust language for geospatial computation.

item.title: You're Projecting
item.description: A first taste of using Rust, where we use the "proj" library to transform latitude and longitude into more useful units of measurement like meters.

item.title: Feature Creek
item.description: Explore the different ways geospatial data can be stored and what using them looks like in Rust.

item.title: Join the Party
item.description: Use spatial joins to combine attributes from multiple data sets based on their spatial relationship.
